roleset.name: obey, follow the rules, follow commands

example.name: obey-v: ma'am, yes ma'am!
example.text: If you're a technician, you obey the signals.

example.name: obedience-n
example.text: Lutherans affirmed that Christ as God-man was above the law, and so his obedience of it was not required and hence meritorious.

example.name: obedient-j
example.text: Happy for the exception, the child was obedient of her aunt's command, removing them when she began the trip home.

roleset.note: OBEY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'obey' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet class Compliance. (from obey.01-v predicate notes)
OBEDIENT-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from obedient.01-j)
